title: PDF Signer Input
description: Input configuration for the PDF Signer actor, which converts an XLSX file to PDF and adds a signature and date.

xlsx_key.title: XLSX File Key
xlsx_key.description: The key for the XLSX file stored in the Apify key-value store.

signature_key.title: Signature Image Key
signature_key.description: The key for the signature image stored in the Apify key-value store.

blank_image_key.title: Blank Image Key
blank_image_key.description: The key for the blank image used to cover existing dates in the PDF, stored in the Apify key-value store.
